name: 2.0.0 Beta 17
body:
- Allow git providers to provide build secrets. ([#268](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/268))
- Allow underscores in GitLab tokens ([#272](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/272))
- Add documentation around `checkPagedCallback()` ([#278](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/278))
- Introduce `--use-ssh` to perform initial repo push over SSH ([#279](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/279))
- Update 'build:env:create' to comment on a PR instead of a commit ([#280](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/280))
- Better docs for `build:comment:add:commit` and `build:comment:add:pr` ([#285](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/285))
- Add configuration example for self-hosted GitLab hostname. ([#286](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/286))
- Remove Bitbucket limitation in README ([#291](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/291))
- Support private Composer repos with `TERMINUS_BUILD_TOOLS_COMPOSER_AUTH` env variable ([#292](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/292))
- Add documentation for build:project:create options ([#293](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/293))
- Allow source_branch and sha for GitLab branch name in branchesForPullRequests output ([#299](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/299))
- Retrieve GitLab merge request states individually ([#301](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/301))
- Remove unused use declarations ([#303](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/303))
- Add scheduled CLU task creation to Bitbucket provider `startTesting` task ([#304](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/304))

name: 2.0.0 Beta 16
body:
- Update `BitbucketAPI` to handle API data pagination ([#267](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/267))
- Make `isPagedResponse()` and `getPagerInfo()` more flexible and typehint ([#264](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/264))
- Fix PHP notices when interacting with BitBucket API data ([#263](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/263))
	- BitBucket's API response is shaped differently than GitHub and GitLab. The values themselves are nested in a `values` key.
- Mark `branchesForPullRequests` method public ([#260](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/260))
- Properly parse the BitBucket visibility flag ([#256](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/256))
- Add missing use statement in BitbucketProvider ([#212](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/212))

name: 2.0.0 Beta 15
body: - Revert to `build:env:push` if `build:env:create` is run against dev ([#248](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/248))

name: 2.0.0 Beta 14
body:
New Features:

- Private repository support for `build:project:create` ([#226](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/226))
- Allow setting the Pantheon region during `build:project:create` ([#225](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/225))
- Build assets on project creation if command exists ([#207](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/207))


GitLab support:

- Add support for creating scheduled GitLab Pipeline ([#232](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/232))
- Add Drupal 8 GitLab test ([#245](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/245))
- Allow git providers to override build metadata ([#200](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/200))


Bug fixes:

- Gracefully fail if build:env:create source and multidev are the same ([#227](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/227))

Misc:

- Documentation updates ([#243](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/243))
- Clear Composer cache before running `build:project:create` in tests ([#242](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/242))
